entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
